channel.title: Change color of items like p hats!
channel.description: is it possible to change the color code of items like p hats??

item.title: Change color of items like p hats!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

client.java is in a client but it is also in a server source. Client.class is just a Java file that uses textures and streams from the cache and puts it together into a game. The client.class in clients are used to pretty much run all of the other class files so the client can extract the information from the cache and run server sources.

Pimpscape = Server Source (run.bat to run it and people log onto it using a client)

Moparscape = client used to log on to server sources (look above for information on Server Sources ^)

Read full topic
item.source: Change color of items like p hats!

item.title: Change color of items like p hats!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

You have to edit the client not the source. A source would be like Testscape, Whitescape, Cheezscape, ect. A client is like Moparscape.

Read full topic

item.title: Change color of items like p hats!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

DAWIGG:

you have to have your own client

Actually you just need an open-sourced client to do these things. You can edit class30_sub3_sub1_sub2 I believe to change objects. Another class30 is used for changing items. But this only changes the textures and only you can see it being changed.
